value:
Daniel's my older twin brother. He's
more serious and gentle than I am.
I should take a page out of his book.

We hail from Crimea but as members
of a merchant caravan, we get to visit
a lot of different countries.

A mage named Ilyana traveled
with us for a time. She sure did have
a hearty appetite...

Muston leads the caravan, my brother,
Daniel, operates the forge, Aimee runs
a shop, and I buy second-hand items.

Anna's shop is popular here, right?
Well, the caravan's gonna move in
and take a piece of that pie!

I'm Jorge from the merchant caravan.
Check out these quality goods I'm
selling from $Nf.$k$pAlso... Between you and me, I've got
better deals on wares than Anna's
shop does.

Daniel's forged weapons are really
something, huh? Now I can fight
AND shove!

I can defend myself just as easily as
anybody else! Did you underestimate
me just because I'm a merchant? Pft.
Ah... This won't be good for business.

Thanks for having my back. I was just
thinking about how much I wanted this!

Greetings! I'm Jorge, a merchant with
the traveling caravan. I've got quality
imports to sell, so take a gander!

Hey, it's my favorite customer!
Looking for anything in particular?
I'm your guy for thrift finds!$k$pBut, to be honest, if I had the choice,
I'd rather be selling dresses to lovely
ladies instead of dealing weapons.$k$pEven in another world, no one can
truly escape war. Mulling over it just
gets me choked up...$k$pI can't let patrons see the rain clouds
over my head, though. It's bad for
business.$k$pWe merchants should do our best to
bring peace. Let us know how we can
all work together moving forward!
それっ
当たれ！
うわっ
Ouch...
At your service!
Hey! Excuse me!
Stay back, you!
Thanks! Come again!
I knew this would happen...
Haha
The name's Jorge. I belong to a merchant caravan, so I'm used to visiting different places.
Whoa! What are you doing? I might drop something! Please—I can't afford to break the merchandise.
Hey, just so you know—I'd like to be paired up with a nice girl, not some punk.
Daniel, my twin brother, is famous for crafting weapons. Great stuff!
If I can't capitalize on these circumstances...then I'm a fool!
If the rumors are true, then there might be hope...
It's been a pleasure doing business with you. You have the air of an extra-special customer, you know?
You're sending me?
Well, hmm...
Time to settle up.
